testCases.label: Greet with empty name
testCases.description: Clicks submit without entering a name and asserts that the text element with id 'text' displays 'Hello,'.

testCases.label: Greet with short name
testCases.description: Enters the short name 'Rick' into the input with id 'input', clicks submit, and asserts that the text element with id 'text' displays 'Hello, Rick'.

testCases.label: Greet with long name
testCases.description: Enters a long full name into the input with id 'input', clicks submit, and asserts that the text element with id 'text' displays the full greeting with the entire name.
